OOC: As you wish!

The capsule's computer suddenly came online.
-Status report: Section 1: Thrusters: damaged beyond repairs.
                Section 2: Energy core: depletion, can be repaired.
                Section 3: Stasis chamber: damaged, section 4 
jeopardized
                Section 4: Transformer: energy levels low, mode 
acquired. Identification: #654148. Name: Unknown. Allegeance: Autobot.

Mustex's repairs on the alimentation wires brought more energy in the 
capsule. It went, by default, to the bot inside.

Computer: Section 4 status changed. Coming online.

???????: Ooooh... What in the slaggin' pit? Oooh... My head hurts...
The voice came from inside the capsule.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Mustex: Stallex forget it I think he has a vehicle form. I think I 
> almost got it.
> 
> He keeps fidgeting with the wireing.
> 
> OOC: The reason I'm taking so long is that I think it would be best 
if 
> wingedwarrior posts that he actually goes online.
>

on
